Create Wallet
  • Download Phantom or your wallet of choice from the App store or Google Play store for free. Desktop users, download the Google Chrome Extension by going to phantom.app.
Buy Sol
  • Have SOL in your wallet to switch to $GP. If you don’t have SOL, you can buy directly on Phantom, transfer from another wallet, or buy on another exchange and send it to your wallet.
Go to Raydium
  • Connect to Raydium. Go to raydium.io/swap on your browser in your Phantom app. Connect your wallet. Paste the $GP token address into Raydium, select $GP, and confirm. When Phantom prompts you for a wallet signature, sign.
Swap for $GP
  • Swap SOL for $GP. We have ZERO taxes so you don’t need to worry about buying with a specific slippage, although you may need to use slippage during times of market volatility.

With $GP, you're not just rich in the game, you're rich where you don't have friends too.
